title: Arduino Debuts Nano 33 BLE Rev2 with Dual IMUs and MicroPython Support
description: The recently introduced Arduino Nano 33 BLE Rev2 builds on the success of its predecessor, the Nano 33 BLE, by retaining the compact size and 3.3-V compatibility, while enhancing its features and capabilities. This board is well-suited for a diverse range of projects, including wearable technology to advanced robotics. This device incorporates the u-blox NINA-B306, […]
